data.title: Sharsheret Pink Day 2024
data.text:
Wednesday, February 12, 2025

If February 14th does not work for your schedule, please choose the date that works best for your community.

Sharsheret Pink Day is a worldwide initiative spearheaded by students, communities and organizations to unite and raise awareness of breast cancer and ovarian cancer through a wide range of educational and fundraising events.

Individuals and students are empowered to educate others on ways to safeguard their health in an effort to save lives. Sharsheret Pink Day is an opportunity to show support and make a difference as you join thousands of others sharing information about Sharsheret’s vital programs and services in person and on social media.
